name: io.github.pab1it0/chess-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Chess.com's Published Data API providing access to player data, game records, and other public information through standardized MCP interfaces.

tools.name: get_player_profile
tools.description: Get a player's profile from Chess.com

tools.name: get_player_stats
tools.description: Get a player's stats from Chess.com

tools.name: is_player_online
tools.description: Check if a player is currently online on Chess.com

tools.name: get_titled_players
tools.description: Get a list of titled players from Chess.com

tools.name: get_player_current_games
tools.description: Get a player's ongoing games on Chess.com

tools.name: get_player_games_by_month
tools.description: Get a player's games for a specific month from Chess.com

tools.name: get_player_game_archives
tools.description: Get a list of available monthly game archives for a player on Chess.com

tools.name: download_player_games_pgn
tools.description: Download PGN files for all games in a specific month from Chess.com

tools.name: get_club_profile
tools.description: Get information about a club on Chess.com

tools.name: get_club_members
tools.description: Get members of a club on Chess.com
